entry.content:

italics bold monospace

  • Bullet
  • List
    • With
    • Nested
      • Items

Block quote
By Anonymous

def fibonacci(n):
	if n == 0 or n == 1:
		return n
	else:
		return fibonacci(n - 1) + fibonacci(n - 2)

Inline math \(n - 1\)

Block math

\[ \begin{equation} \varphi = \frac{1 + \sqrt{5}}{2} \approx 1.6180339 \end{equation} \]

Footnotes 1 work

  1. ExampleÂ ↩
